name: administratively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the arrangements and work that is needed to control the operation of a plan or organization: The six hospitals are administratively separate from the university. I want to establish an administratively stable organization. See
administrative
More examplesFewer examplesThe process would be very complicated administratively.He likes how the school is organized administratively.Usually, illegal immigrants are fingerprinted, administratively processed and dropped off at the border.

according to the way something is managed or organized: Administratively, it might be difficult to give a test in two parts. It gives refunds by the administratively easy route of taking less under your direct debits.
